description: GSAP Horizontal Scroll Animation - Artist Cards Carousel with 7 cards, vertical-to-horizontal scroll mapping, staggered timing, pinned container, and smooth scrubbing effects

userStories.title: Initialize Next.js project with GSAP dependencies
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a properly configured Next.js project with GSAP and ScrollTrigger installed so I can build scroll-based animations.
acceptanceCriteria: Create new Next.js 16 project with TypeScript using pnpm
Install latest gsap (v3.13+) via pnpm
Install React 19.x
Install TypeScript 5.x
Register ScrollTrigger plugin in app
Project builds without errors (pnpm build)
Typecheck passes (pnpm tsc --noEmit)

userStories.title: Create horizontal scroll section structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to build the HTML structure for the horizontal scroll container and cards so GSAP can animate them.
acceptanceCriteria: Create full-viewport container section (100vh height)
Add 7 card elements with consistent dimensions (60vw width, 70vh height)
Each card has placeholder content: image, name, description
Cards initially positioned off-screen to the right
Container has proper overflow handling
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Implement GSAP horizontal scroll animation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to configure GSAP ScrollTrigger to map vertical scroll to horizontal card movement so cards slide left as user scrolls down.
acceptanceCriteria: Pin the horizontal container section during scroll
Cards translate horizontally based on vertical scroll position
Scrub enabled with value of 1 for smooth scroll-follow
End value calculated dynamically based on container width (e.g., +=4000)
All 7 cards traverse across viewport fully
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add staggered card entry animation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement staggered timing so cards cascade into view with a fanning effect rather than moving all at once.
acceptanceCriteria: Each card has staggered delay (0.15s between cards)
Cards animate from opacity 0 and offset x position (x: 100)
Stagger triggers when section enters viewport (start: 'top center')
Creates cascading/fanning visual effect
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Style cards with dark mode neon aesthetic
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to style the cards with a dark mode and neon accents design so the page has a modern, edgy visual aesthetic.
acceptanceCriteria: Dark background (near black: #0a0a0f or #1a1a2e)
Neon accent colors (cyan: #00ffff, magenta: #ff00ff, lime: #00ff00)
Cards have rounded corners (border-radius: 16px or similar)
Cards have shadow/depth effects (box-shadow)
Hover states with glow effects on cards
Modern sans-serif typography (Inter, Space Grotesk, or similar)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add placeholder artist content
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to populate cards with mock artist data so the animation demonstrates realistic content.
acceptanceCriteria: 7 unique artist cards with placeholder names (Artist 1-7 or creative names)
Each card has placeholder image (Unsplash URL or gradient background)
Brief description text on each card
Consistent card dimensions across all 7 cards
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add page header and scroll progress indicator
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a title at the top and know when I've completed the scroll so I understand the page structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Fixed or sticky header with project title
Visual indicator of scroll progress (progress bar or similar)
End state shows completion message or visual cue
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
